jcurses.widgets

Class ToggleButtonGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcurses.widgets.ToggleButtonGroup

  • public class ToggleButtonGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a set of ToggleButton Only one ToggleButton in this group can be selected

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Vector<ToggleButton> buttons 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ToggleButtonGroup()
      Creates a new ButtonGroup.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(ToggleButton b)
      Adds a radio button to the group.
      void clearSelection()
      Clears the selection such that none of the buttons in the ToggleButtonGroup are selected.
      int getButtonCount()
      Returns the number of buttons in the group.
      java.util.Enumeration<ToggleButton> getElements()
      Returns all the buttons that are participating in this group.
      ToggleButton getSelection()
      Returns the selected button.
      void remove(ToggleButton b)
      Removes the button from the group.
      void setSelected(ToggleButton b, boolean selected)
      Sets the selected value for the ToggleButton.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ToggleButtonGroup

        public ToggleButtonGroup()
        Creates a new ButtonGroup.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(ToggleButton b)
        Adds a radio button to the group.
        Parameters:
        b - the radio button to be added

      • remove

        public void remove(ToggleButton b)
        Removes the button from the group.
        Parameters:
        b - the button to be removed

      • clearSelection

        public void clearSelection()
        Clears the selection such that none of the buttons in the ToggleButtonGroup are selected.

      • getButtonCount

        public int getButtonCount()
        Returns the number of buttons in the group.
        Returns:
        the button count

      • getElements

        public java.util.Enumeration<ToggleButton> getElements()
        Returns all the buttons that are participating in this group.
        Returns:
        an Enumeration of the buttons in this group

      • getSelection

        public ToggleButton getSelection()
        Returns the selected button.
        Returns:
        the selected button

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(ToggleButton b,
               boolean selected)
        Sets the selected value for the ToggleButton. Only one button in the group may be selected at a time.
        Parameters:
        b - the ToggleButton
        selected - true if this button is to be selected, otherwise false
